amendatorysection.para: It is the intent of the Legislature to evolve Nebraska's economic development and job creation policies in order to remain competitive by adopting recommendations from the statewide strategic plan developed by the Innovation and Entrepreneurship Task Force. The strategic plan recognizes that Nebraska's current policy tools targeted to fostering high-wage job growth among small businesses, entrepreneurs, and innovators have not kept pace with other states and jurisdictions. Nebraska has a clear opportunity to improve our entrepreneurial ecosystem by adopting proactive policy solutions with demonstrated positive results.
